property.name: Move existing fighters to new carriers
notes
property.value:
Use rules from AAE but with France & Italy added.
Inactive major powers can't leave their territories.
Russia is a separate alliance at war with both the Axis & the Allies
Turn#6 United States Americans Activates. Until then US can't move.

This scenario is based on the force strengths given in Martin Gilbert, Recent History Atlas
German ground strength has been boosted 50% and air strength 25% to reflect German qualitative superiority.

property.name: Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Battleships repair at end of round
Naval Bombard Casualties Return Fire Restricted
Produce new fighters on old carriers
